thread.title: Sony is making its own wireless earbuds
thread.title_full: Sony is making its own wireless earbuds

author: Mat Smith
title: Sony is making its own wireless earbuds
text:
Sony is making its own wireless earbuds But they're still just prototypes for now. Share Save 
In these heady days of headphone-free smartphones, there's money to be made in the wireless headphone game . Sony revealed plenty of upgraded wireless speakers and headphones at its CES press event today, but it also had some work-in-progress protoypes. First up; tiny wireless in-ear buds, and also some neck-anchored wireless headphones. Expect to hear more about later this year, but Sony was showing two different colors for each prototype, as well as charging cases for the in-ear buds. There's no price and no date, but they look small, unassuming, and will be another notable wireless bud option when there's not much competition . The company's Xperia Ear didn't quite seal the deal . Gallery: Sony wireless in-ear bud prototypes at CES 2017 | 8 Photos 8
